name: Megalovania: Just Shapes and Beats Edition
name_original: Megalovania: Just Shapes and Beats Edition
description:
Seems you've stumbled upon a strange alternate reality where Sans can only strike to the beat of some really groovy music!  Can you dance and dodge your way through this spectacular bullet hell minigame? 

Use arrow keys or ASDW to move.  Avoid anything white!

*IMPORTANT!*

If the game loses focus, use the "Wake Up!" button to restore focus!
